<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Leukodaemon (Pestilence Daemon)](/Monsters.aspx?ID=90)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

These skull-headed, vulture-winged daemons are harbingers of pestilence and servants of their patron Horseman, Apollyon. Manifestations of evil souls who perished from disease in life, leukodaemons work tirelessly to spread disease across all the worlds of the multiverse. More than any other daemon, leukodaemons cooperate with each other and those who conjure them to mortal worlds to spread sickness and plague, eschewing personal glory for end results.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 26

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Daemon_Leukodaemon.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 9">[Leukodaemon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=90)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Daemon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=213" />
<trait label="Fiend" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=70" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 72</row>

**Perception** +20; darkvision, plaguesense 60 feet

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Daemonic](/Languages.aspx?ID=31); telepathy 100 feet

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +18, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +18, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +20, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +20, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +18, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +16

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +5

**Con** +1

**Int** +3

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Plaguesense** A leukodaemon senses any creature with a disease, and it knows the type and current stage of all diseases carried by any creature within range.

**Items**
_+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [composite longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74)_ (50 arrows)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 28 

**Fort** +15 

**Ref** +21 

**Will** +19 

+1 status to all saves vs. magic
</row>

**HP** 155

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)

**Weaknesses**
good 10

**Infectious Aura** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) 30 feet. Leukodaemons radiate infection. All creatures within 30 feet of a leukodaemon take a –2 status penalty to saves against disease effects. If a creature within range contracts or progresses a disease, all adjacent creatures are exposed to the same disease, at the same DC.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, fly 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +21 ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d12+9 piercing plus 1d6 evil and daemonic pestilence

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +21 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d8+9 slashing plus 1d6 evil and daemonic pestilence

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_composite longbow_ +21 ([deadly 1d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)),
**Damage** 2d8+9 piercing plus 1d6 evil and daemonic pestilence

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 26
- **1st**
[Detect Alignment](/Spells.aspx?ID=65) (at will; good only)
- **4th**
[Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) (at will), [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78) (x2)
- **5th**
[Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69)

**Breath Weapon** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) The leukodaemon exhales a cloud of corpse-bloated, biting black flies in a 20-foot cone. Creatures within the cone take 4d8 piercing damage (DC 28 basic Reflex save). A creature that fails the save becomes [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) (or [sickened 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) on a critical failure).

**Daemonic Pestilence**  ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) The leukodaemon can telepathically communicate with the afflicted creature at any distance on the same plane; **Saving Throw** DC 28 Fortitude; **Stage 1** carrier (1 day); **Stage 2** [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) (1 day); **Stage 3** [drained 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) (1 day); **Stage 4** [drained 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) (1 day); **Stage 5** [drained 3](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) (1 week); **Stage 6** dead

**Quicken Pestilence** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) The leukodaemon coaxes a disease into full bloom. It chooses a target in its aura of pestilence that’s currently affected by a disease. That creature must attempt a Fortitude save against the disease as if the interval for the disease’s current stage had passed.

</column>

name: Leukodaemon
